Uses of Package
org.openhab.core.items

  • Packages that use org.openhab.core.items 
    Package Description
    org.openhab.core.items  
    org.openhab.core.library.items  
    org.openhab.core.library.types  
    org.openhab.core.persistence  
    org.openhab.library.tel.items  
    org.openhab.model.item.binding  
    org.openhab.ui.chart  
    org.openhab.ui.items  
  • Classes in org.openhab.core.items used by org.openhab.core.items 
    Class and Description
    GenericItem
    The abstract base class for all items.
    GroupFunction
    Group functions are used by active group items to calculate a state for the group out of the states of all its member items.
    Item
    This interface defines the core features of an openHAB item.
    ItemLookupException
    This is an abstract parent exception to be extended by any exceptions related to item lookups in the item registry.
    ItemNotFoundException
    This exception is thrown by the ItemRegistry if an item could not be found.
    ItemNotUniqueException
    This exception can be thrown whenever a search pattern does not uniquely identify an item.
    ItemProvider
    An item provider provides instances of GenericItem.
    ItemRegistryChangeListener
    This is a listener interface which should be implemented where ever the item registry is used in order to be notified of any dynamic changes in the provided items.
    ItemsChangeListener
    This is a listener interface which should be implemented where ever item providers or the item registry are used in order to be notified of any dynamic changes in the provided items.
    StateChangeListener
    This interface must be implemented by all classes that want to be notified about changes in the state of an item.
  • Classes in org.openhab.core.items used by org.openhab.core.library.items 
    Class and Description
    GenericItem
    The abstract base class for all items.
    Item
    This interface defines the core features of an openHAB item.
  • Classes in org.openhab.core.items used by org.openhab.core.library.types 
    Class and Description
    GroupFunction
    Group functions are used by active group items to calculate a state for the group out of the states of all its member items.
    Item
    This interface defines the core features of an openHAB item.
  • Classes in org.openhab.core.items used by org.openhab.core.persistence 
    Class and Description
    Item
    This interface defines the core features of an openHAB item.
  • Classes in org.openhab.core.items used by org.openhab.library.tel.items

    The abstract base class for all items.

  • Classes in org.openhab.core.items used by org.openhab.model.item.binding 
    Class and Description
    Item
    This interface defines the core features of an openHAB item.
  • Classes in org.openhab.core.items used by org.openhab.ui.chart 
    Class and Description
    ItemNotFoundException
    This exception is thrown by the ItemRegistry if an item could not be found.
  • Classes in org.openhab.core.items used by org.openhab.ui.items 
    Class and Description
    Item
    This interface defines the core features of an openHAB item.
    ItemRegistry
    The ItemRegistry is the central place, where items are kept in memory and their state is permanently tracked.
